```{r, include = F}
require(tidyverse)
require(dplR)
```

```{r}
files <- list.files("../../../../Dropbox (Stephens Lab)/SORTIE/Growth_mortality/data/Growth Mortality Dendro Data/", full.names = T, pattern = ".raw")
```

```{r}
for(i in 1:length(files)){
  file <- files[i]
  rwl <- read.rwl(file)
  if(i >1){
    df <- combine.rwl(rwl, df)
  } else {
    df <- rwl
  }
}
```
